verbs.description: [V: ruby] american [ARG1: bulldog] mix up for adoption at arlgp ruby is 5-years - old and currently lives at a foster home she loves playing with a ball and is mildly active when she is n't resting and relaxing if you are interested in taking home ruby you can adopt him from our friends at animal refuge league of greater portland in westbrook animal welfare society hurricane maria bulldog boston puerto rico cocheco valley humane society partner portland paws maine coastal aroostook humane society kennebec humane society hancock county animal refuge league maine chinchilla shelter adoption animal refuge league of greater portland westbrook new hampshire
